name: patient_age
description: Patient age (must be 18 years or older unless otherwise specified)

name: patient_bmi
description: Body Mass Index (BMI) used to assess eligibility for bariatric surgery

name: comorbidity_flag
description: Whether patient has obesity-related co-morbid condition (e.g., diabetes, hypertension, cardiovascular disease, severe obstructive sleep apnea, Pickwickian syndrome, obesity related cardiomyopathy)

name: weight_loss_program_participation
description: Past participation in a weight loss program

name: conservative_therapy_attempt
description: Inadequate weight loss despite a committed attempt at conservative medical therapy (e.g., lifestyle interventions, diet, exercise, behavioral modifications)

name: preop_medical_clearance
description: Completion of pre-operative medical evaluation and clearance

name: preop_mental_health_clearance
description: Completion of pre-operative mental health evaluation and clearance

name: preop_education
description: Completion of pre-operative education about risks, benefits, expectations, and need for long-term follow-up

name: treatment_plan
description: Presence of a treatment plan addressing pre- and post-operative needs

name: procedure_code_HCPCS
description: HCPCS codes for bariatric procedures (e.g., C9784, C9785)

name: procedure_code_ICD10
description: ICD-10 Procedure codes for bariatric procedures and complications (e.g., 0DP60CZ, 0DV64ZZ, 0DW60CZ, 0D160ZA, 0DB60ZZ)

name: diagnosis_code_ICD10
description: ICD-10 Diagnosis codes for obesity, BMI ranges, and bariatric surgery status (e.g., E66.01, E66.2, Z68.20-Z68.45, Z98.84)

name: surgical_complication_flag
description: Indicates whether a surgical complication (e.g., fistula, obstruction, erosion, GERD, pouch enlargement) is present

name: revision_conversion_flag
description: Indicates whether revision or conversion to another surgical procedure is required due to inadequate weight loss, weight regain, or complications
